text:
Mr. William G. Harley
- 2 -
VERVOLGVEL
We are as enthusiastic as you about the
possibilities of the new project, the more so since you and
Mr, Burrows do everything to make this project a succesful
one.
You may like to know already that your hotel
will be: Grand Hotel Goo Hand, Emmastraat 2, Hilversum,
telephone: 48441 .
We, at Badio Nederland, are looking forward to
your visit very much.
Sincerely Yours,
RADIO NEDERLAND WERELDOMROEP
Head Central Programme Service
